summary: Adds in Forsworn clothing with the same appearance as the Forsworn armor.
descriptionHtml:
Adds in Forsworn clothing with the same appearance as Forsworn armor. Why? Because I liked the way Forsworn armor looks, and wanted clothing to wear as a mage using the Mage Armor perks from SPERG and such. Because of this, all of it is considered clothing, with reduced weight, and no armor bonuses.

To get the armor, one must use the console. It all starts with "Forsworn Cloth", so
help "forsworn cloth" 4
in the console will list all four items to add to your inventory.
author: SarelFox
